schema.description: The master PW in the CES ACR clock domain changed.

slot.description: Slot ID of the clock source.

card.description: Card ID of the clock source.

schema.description: The status of the clock source changed.

chassis-id.description: Chassis ID. In the case of a single chassis, the value is 1.

source-name.description: Name of the current clock source.

old-source-state.description: Clock source state before the change.

chassis-index.description: Index of the chassis where the clock source is located. In the case of a single chassis, the index is 1.

source-state.description: Status of the current clock source.

schema.description: The working mode of the system clock changed.

chassis-id.description: Indicates the ID of the chassis where the clock source resides, The index is always 1 for a single chassis.

old-lock-mode.description: Indicates the old lock mode of the clock source.

attr-chassis-index.description: Index of the chassis where the clock source is located. In the case of a single chassis, the index is 1.

lock-mode.description: Indicates the lock mode of the system clock.

schema.description: Gnss model change notification.

ifindex.description: Specifies the index of the port on which the working mode is changed.

ifname.description: Specifies the name of the port on which the working mode is changed.

schema.description: The SSM level of the clock source was changed.

chassis-id.description: Chassis ID. The value is 1 in single chassis scenarios.

source-name.description: Name of the current clock source.

schema.description: The working mode of the system clock changed.

chassis-id.description: Indicates the ID of the chassis where the clock source resides, The value is 1 in single chassis scenarios.

pll-id.description: Indicates the clock source type ID.

old-source-name.description: Indicates the last clock source name.

source-name.description: Indicates the current clock source name.

chassis-index.description: Indicates the index of the chassis where the clock source resides,.The value is 1 in single chassis scenarios.

src-type.description: Indicates the type of clock source selection.

src-mode.description: Indicates the mode of clock source selection.

schema.description: The PTSF status of PTP adaptive clock synchronization is changed.

server-index.description: Server index for the PTSF status change.

schema.description: This trap was generated when the clock source changed.

old-clock-id.description: Indicates the ID of the old master clock.

clock-id.description: Indicates the ID of the current master clock.

ifindex.description: Indicates the port index of the current clock source.

old-port-num.description: Indicates the port number of the original clock source.

port-num.description: Indicates the port number of the current clock source.

old-ifname.description: Indicates the port name of the original clock source.

ifname.description: Indicates the port name of the current clock source.

schema.description: The optical fiber length on the Passive port was changed.

change-value.description: New time offset caused by the fiber length change of the current port.

value-flag.description: Positive or negative sign of the new time offset.

schema.description: The PTP port clock source information is changed. The clock source ID, clock source port number, or clock source's hop count received on a port was changed.

clock-id.description: Clock source ID received on a port.

port-num.description: Clock source port number received on a port.

steps.description: Clock source's hop count received on a port.

master-clock-id.description: ID of the current master clock source.

schema.description: The alarm was generated when the interface status changed.

ifname.description: Name of the port whose state has changed.

schema.description: The status of the client list was refreshed.

client-ip-list.description: Indicates the IP address of the client.

client-index.description: Indicates the Index of the client.

client-id.description: Indicates the ID of the client.

schema.description: The negotiation status of the client with server 1 and with server 2 changed.

nego-state.description: Indicates the negotiation status of the client with server.

error-reason.description: Indicates causes of the negotiation failure.

schema.description: The clock source traced by the client changed.

old-trace-source.description: Historical clock source that the client has traced.

trace-source.description: Current clock source that the client is synchroniazation.

schema.description: The value of State can be: normal(0), indicating that 1588 ACR/ATR PDV data performance is normal. limitExceed(1), indicating that 1588 ACR/ATR PDV data performance exceeds the threshold.

state.description: 1588 ACR/ATR PDV data threshold-crossing event occurred.
